name: Greenlite
headline: AI agents for financial compliance operations
description: Greenlite builds AI workers for bank and fintech compliance teams. Innovative teams use our AI workers instead of outsourced teams to onboard customers faster with higher compliance standards.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:payments; industry:b2b; industry:compliance; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Will Lawrence, Founder
founders.description:
Will led product for Facebook's anti-money laundering (AML)  platform, combatting financial crimes across payment, gaming and e-commerce use cases. He also built core compliance infrastructure at Paxos, a growth-staged fintech that powers over 10M crypto wallets globally. 

He's now Co-founder and CEO of Greenlite, helping fintechs scale financial crime operations with AI.

founders.name: Alex Jin, Founder
founders.description:
Formerly a product manager and iOS engineer on Dropbox growth and monetization teams. First employee at Flixed where I led product development and built a programmatic content engine.

Co-founder of Greenlite.

# AI Agents for AML, Sanctions and EDD
Greenlite agents automate repetitive financial compliance work, helping you scale with unparalleled efficiency.
Thanks for booking a demo with us!One of our experts will contact you as soon as posible.
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

## Agents handle L1 workthat is slowing down your team
By tackling the repetitive work in financial crime, Greenlite agents lets your staff focus on real risks and proactive compliance.
### Clearing screeningalert backlogs
Greenlite remediates L1 sanction, PEP and adverse media alerts, helping your analysts focus on real risks instead of false positives.
[Screening Alerts](https://www.greenlite.ai/</products/screening-alerts>)
### Handling transaction monitoring alerts
Greenlite helps transaction monitoring teams remediate more alerts faster with better documentation.
[Transaction Monitoring](https://www.greenlite.ai/</products/transaction-alerts>)
### Performing enhanceddue diligence
Greenlite automates high-risk customer reviews at onboarding and during regular review cycles.
[Customer Due Diligence](https://www.greenlite.ai/</products/customer-due-diligence>)
### Automatingonboarding reviews
Greenlite automates KYC and KYB reviews that were previously manual, allowing you to onboard good customers faster.
[Enhanced Due Diligence](https://www.greenlite.ai/</products/enhanced-due-diligence>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6499f61ad1823fabf0ffc16d/66bb04cafc5ba5a52c2638b8_product-line.svg)
### Plus many more workflows
#### Monitoring & Surveillance 
Automate L1 trade monitoring and surveillance alert handling, helping your team focus on genuine risks.
#### Third-party risk management
Complete TPRM reviews more efficiently, helping you uncover and mitigate vendor risks with ease.
#### KYC Refreshes
Automate customer refreshes with advances analytics.
#### Fraud alerts
Soon
Review fraud alerts more efficiently, helping you catch fraudsters and minimize losses.
#### Chargebacks
Soon
Respond to chargeback alerts more efficiently, helping you minimize losses.
#### Surveillance and Monitoring
Soon
React to trade surveillance alerts more efficiently by automating entity and transaction resarch.
## Greenlite is loved by compliance,technology and executive leadership

## Bring AIto your existing workflows
Greenlite is designed to work seamlessly with your existing systems, helping you unlock the benefits of generative AI without having to “rip and replace” what’s already working.
01
01
#### Connects to your case management system
Greenlite's robust API and webhook platform allow it to work seamlessly with popular case management solutions. 
#### Keep your SOP's and process
Use the same policies and procedures you normally use. Greenlite learns your processes and follows them to a tee, creating more detailed and auditable reports.
02
02
#### Reduce time-per-case by 70-90%
Automate manual, repetitive tasks to free your team up to focus their attention where it’s needed most. Speed up casework, optimize and scale your operations, and stay on top of activity and performance—boosting productivity, reducing risk, and keeping costs low.
03
03
## Built for highly regulated financial institutions
#### Leading audibilityand record keeping
#### Built inregulatory guidance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6499f61ad1823fabf0ffc16d/66bda5da3c96b62af6ffe826_socII.avif)
#### SOC 2 Type IICompliant
## Greenlite turnscompliance intoyour competitive advantage
#### Improve compliance
Eliminate backlogs and be prepared for spikes by augmenting your team with advanced technology.
#### Eliminate risks
By automating the mundane, your team can focus on proactive risk identification and closing program gaps.
#### Faster customer onboarding
Improve the customer experience by automating reviews that were previously manual.
#### Scale flexibly
Be prepared for spikes and low-seasons with flexible automations.
#### Auditable AI
Improve your documentation quality and program auditability with advanced record keeping and evidence gathering.
#### Eliminate manual work
Help your team focus on meaningful, engaging work that moves your financial crime program forward.
## Work smarter,not harder
Get in touch to understand how Greenlite can help your team move faster with better compliance.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Greenlite**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Greenlite is carving out a niche in the intersection of artificial intelligence and financial compliance. Based in San Francisco and comprised of a dedicated team of six, Greenlite’s mission is to empower banks and fintech companies with AI agents designed specifically for financial compliance operations.

### What They Do

Initially focused on building AI workers for compliance teams, Greenlite innovates the way financial institutions handle customer onboarding. Their technology replaces traditional outsourced teams, enabling faster onboarding with enhanced compliance standards. As a result, clients can streamline their processes, reduce false positives, and significantly cut down on manual overhead.

### Product Offerings

Greenlite has developed a suite of products including:

- **Screening Alerts:** Helps users investigate alerts from existing systems, efficiently closing clear false positives.
- **Transaction Monitoring Alerts:** Adds the rigor of senior analyst reviews to transaction alerts, improving response times and accuracy.
- **Customer Due Diligence:** Automates the review of customer documentation and financial statements to identify potential risks.
- **Enhanced Due Diligence:** Optimizes high-risk customer reviews through better automation.

### Features

Their technology also offers features that enhance business understanding and due diligence:

- **Data Integrations:** Easily gather corporate registry data and enrich understanding of both business and individual customers.
- **AI Analysis:** Automate analysis of financial statements, generate compliance narratives quickly, and assess the online presence of clients.
- **Ongoing Monitoring:** Automate periodic risk reviews for high-risk customers, ensuring continuous compliance oversight.

### Target Market

Greenlite primarily partners with banks, fintechs, and credit unions, providing them with the tools they need to remain compliant while scaling their businesses. The company emphasizes its ability to integrate seamlessly with existing workflows, thus changing the game without disrupting current operations.

### Leadership and Vision

The company is supported by esteemed leaders in the compliance and financial sectors, including Group Partner Tom Blomfield. They are also trusted by industry players who endorse the effectiveness of Greenlite’s solutions. With an emphasis on both innovation and compliance, Greenlite is poised to become a leader in transforming how financial institutions manage compliance.

### Conclusion

In a world where efficiency and compliance are paramount, Greenlite stands out as a pioneer for financial institutions looking to integrate AI into their operations. By automating the labor-intensive aspects of compliance, they allow teams to focus more on strategic, high-value activities—a win-win for both their clients and the industry at large. 

For more information, visit their website at [Greenlite.ai](https://www.greenlite.ai).
